event_name: Azure webinar series: Extend and Innovate with SAP BTP on Azure
description:
Discover how deploying SAP AI services in Microsoft Azure enables seamless integration and AI-driven innovation. This webinar explores the general benefits of SAP BTP on Azure with a focus on the topics of AI, security and identity.
Key takeaways:
Benefits of running SAP BTP on Azure, including scalability and joint innovationsLive demo and reference architecture insightsResearch-backed validation of SAP BTP on Azure’s impactQ&A session with experts
